item.title: Sun Pendant Necklace in 14k Gold & Diamond
item.description: Product Details Light up your wardrobe with this stunning sun symbol Le Vian pendant necklace, set with Chocolate Diamonds® and Nude Diamonds™.

item.title: Blueberry Sapphire Flower Statement Ring in 14k Rose Gold & Diamond
item.description: Product Details Harness the fabulous power of flowers with this stunning Blueberry Sapphire™ and Nude Diamond™ statement ring from Le Vian.

item.title: Diamond Solitaire Pendant Necklace in 14k White Gold
item.description: Product Details: Few things are as beautiful or as enchanting as this simple solitaire diamond pendant necklace, captured within a white gold setting by TruMiracle®.

item.title: Diamond Heart Pendant Necklace in 14k White Gold
item.description: Product Details: Wear it both ways. This versatile classic diamond (1/2 ct. t.w.) heart pendant necklace is designed to reflect your mood: romantic when worn straight and playful when worn sideways.

item.title: Sapphire Flower Cubic Zirconia Tennis Bracelet
item.description: Product Details Introducing the Cubic Zirconia Tennis Bracelet, the perfect jewelry accessory for the tennis player in your life! 18k White Gold Plated Length: 7 Inches 1: AAA+Sapphire Cubic Zirconia, Quantity 39, Round Cut, Size 3.

item.title: Polished Twist-Look Band in 10k White Gold
item.description: Product Details Layered, stacked, or standalone, this gorgeous band adds chic style to your look. Available in: 10k gold, 10k rose gold, or 10k white gold.

item.title: Sapphire & Diamond Pendant Necklace in 14k Gold
item.description: Product Details This stunning necklace features a pear-cut emerald, accented by a small diamond. Emerald: 3/4 ct. t.w. Ruby: 1 ct.

item.title: Sterling Silver Multicolor Sapphire Pave Star
item.description: Product Details Dive into cool style in ocean blue hues. Saph Splash by Effy Collection pendant features pave-set, multicolored sapphires (2-3/4 ct.

item.title: Diamond Chain Link Ring in Gold Vermeil
item.description: Product Details A stylish chain link ring is topped with a single diamond - from Audrey by Aurate. 1/10 Carat Diamond Ring

item.title: Tube Linear Drop Earrings in in 14k Gold
item.description: Product Details Shape your style with these leverback earrings, featuring a sculpted, linear tube drop in 14k gold. Approximate drop: 1-1/2 inches.

item.title: 2-Pc. Set Diamond Bangle Bracelets in 14k Gold-Plated Sterling Silver
item.description: Product Details Stack on style with these mega-chic bangle bracelets, with glistening diamonds in complementary designs. 1/5 Carat Diamond Bracelets
